        public final boolean editStaffAccountByAdminOrNutritionist(java.lang.String activityUser,
                                                           java.lang.String staffId,
                                                           java.lang.String newFirstName,
                                                           java.lang.String newLastName,
                                                           java.lang.String newEmail,
                                                           java.lang.String newAddress,
                                                           java.lang.String newHomePhone,
                                                           java.lang.String newCellPhone,
                                                           java.sql.Date dateOfBirth,
                                                           double newSalary,
                                                           java.lang.String newGender,
                                                           java.lang.String jobStatus,
                                                           java.lang.String accountStatus)
        Method to edit account by admin
        Parameters:
        activityUser - the activity user
        staffId -
        newFirstName - the staff first name
        newLastName - the staff last name
        newEmail - the staff email
        newAddress - the staff physical address
        newHomePhone - the staff home phone
        newCellPhone - the staff cell phone
        dateOfBirth - the staff date of birth
        newSalary - the staff salary
        newGender - the staff gender
        jobStatus - the staff job status
        accountStatus - the staff account status
        Returns:
        true when the staff account has been edited
